languages.text: {n}Выждав многозначительную паузу, Джай продолжает в обычной игровой манере:{/n} "Так... что привело вас ко мне, шерин? Надеюсь, не прощальные слова? Ибо я ненавижу прощания. Они словно бы отбирают мое будущее. Ведь вместо "прощай" всегда хочется услышать "увидимся вновь под теми же звездами!"

{n}After a pregnant pause, Jae continues in her usual playful manner:{/n} "So... what brings you to me, shereen? Not parting words, I hope? Because I despise goodbyes. I feel as though they rob me of my future. You never want to hear 'goodbye,' after all, but only ever 'see you again under the same stars!'"
languages.original_text: {n}Выждав многозначительную паузу, Джай продолжает в обычной игровой манере:{/n} "Так... что привело вас ко мне, шерин? Надеюсь, не прощальные слова? Ибо я ненавижу прощания. Они словно бы отбирают мое будущее. Ведь вместо "прощай" всегда хочется услышать "увидимся вновь под теми же звездами!"

I feel as though they rob me of my future. You never want to hear 'goodbye,' after all, but only ever 'see you again under the same stars!'"

I feel as though they rob me of my future. You never want to hear 'goodbye,' after all, but only ever 'see you again under the same stars!'"

I feel as though they rob me of my future. You never want to hear 'goodbye,' after all, but only ever 'see you again under the same stars!'"

{n}After a pregnant pause, Jae continues in her usual playful manner:{/n} "So... what brings you to me, shereen? Not parting words, I hope? Because I despise goodbyes. I feel as though they rob me of my future. You never want to hear 'goodbye,' after all, but only ever 'see you again under the same stars!'"

languages.text: {n}意味深に黙り込んだあと、ジェイはいつものひょうきんな調子で話した。{/n}「それで…どうして会いに来たの、シャリーン？まさか別れの言葉を言うつもりじゃないわよね？あたしはさよならが大嫌いなの。未来が奪われてるみたいな気がして。『さよなら』じゃなくて『また同じ星の下で会おう』って言う方がよほどいいわ！」
languages.original_text: {n}After a pregnant pause, Jae continues in her usual playful manner:{/n} "So... what brings you to me, shereen? Not parting words, I hope? Because I despise goodbyes. I feel as though they rob me of my future. You never want to hear 'goodbye,' after all, but only ever 'see you again under the same stars!'"

traits.locale_text: {n}意味深に黙り込んだあと、ジェイはいつものひょうきんな調子で話した。{/n}「それで…どうして会いに来たの、シャリーン？まさか別れの言葉を言うつもりじゃないわよね？あたしはさよならが大嫌いなの。未来が奪われてるみたいな気がして。『さよなら』じゃなくて『また同じ星の下で会おう』って言う方がよほどいいわ！」

languages.text: {n}婕伊意味深长地停顿半晌，随后再次以一如既往的欢快口吻开了口。{/n}“那么……到底是什么风把你吹来了呢，亲爱的？你不会是来和我道别的吧？因为我不喜欢道别，道别就像是夺走了我的未来一样。我永远不想听到什么‘再见’，我只想听到‘愿我们在同一片星空下重逢’！”
languages.original_text: {n}After a pregnant pause, Jae continues in her usual playful manner:{/n} "So... what brings you to me, shereen? Not parting words, I hope? Because I despise goodbyes. I feel as though they rob me of my future. You never want to hear 'goodbye,' after all, but only ever 'see you again under the same stars!'"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊意味深长地停顿半晌，随后再次以一如既往的欢快口吻开了口。{/n}“那么……到底是什么风把你吹来了呢，亲爱的？你不会是来和我道别的吧？因为我不喜欢道别，道别就像是夺走了我的未来一样。我永远不想听到什么‘再见’，我只想听到‘愿我们在同一片星空下重逢’！”

languages.text: {n}Nach einer bedeutungsschwangeren Pause fährt Jae in ihrer üblichen verspielten Art fort:{/n} "Also ... was führt Euch zu mir, Shereen? Keine Abschiedsworte, hoffe ich? Ich hasse nämlich Abschiede. Es fühlt sich immer an, als würden sie mich meiner Zukunft berauben. Man will schließlich nie 'lebt wohl' hören, sondern immer nur 'wir sehen uns unter denselben Sternen wieder!'"
languages.original_text: {n}After a pregnant pause, Jae continues in her usual playful manner:{/n} "So... what brings you to me, shereen? Not parting words, I hope? Because I despise goodbyes. I feel as though they rob me of my future. You never want to hear 'goodbye,' after all, but only ever 'see you again under the same stars!'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer bedeutungsschwangeren Pause fährt Jae in ihrer üblichen verspielten Art fort:{/n} "Also ... was führt Euch zu mir, Shereen? Keine Abschiedsworte, hoffe ich? Ich hasse nämlich Abschiede. Es fühlt sich immer an, als würden sie mich meiner Zukunft berauben. Man will schließlich nie 'lebt wohl' hören, sondern immer nur 'wir sehen uns unter denselben Sternen wieder!'"

languages.text: {n}Tras una pausa cargada de significado, Jae continúa con su habitual tono juguetón:{/n} «Bueno... ¿qué le trae por aquí, shereen? Espero que no venga a despedirse. Odio las despedidas. Es como si me robaran el futuro. A nadie le gusta oír la palabra "Adiós". Como mucho un "¡nos veremos otra vez bajo estas mismas estrellas!"».
languages.original_text: {n}After a pregnant pause, Jae continues in her usual playful manner:{/n} "So... what brings you to me, shereen? Not parting words, I hope? Because I despise goodbyes. I feel as though they rob me of my future. You never want to hear 'goodbye,' after all, but only ever 'see you again under the same stars!'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras una pausa cargada de significado, Jae continúa con su habitual tono juguetón:{/n} «Bueno... ¿qué le trae por aquí, shereen? Espero que no venga a despedirse. Odio las despedidas. Es como si me robaran el futuro. A nadie le gusta oír la palabra "Adiós". Como mucho un "¡nos veremos otra vez bajo estas mismas estrellas!"».

languages.text: {n}Après un moment de silence lourd de sens, Jae reprend sur son ton enjoué habituel :{/n} « Alors... qu'est-ce qui vous amène, shereen ? Vous ne venez pas me faire vos adieux, j'espère ? Je déteste ça. J'ai l'impression que ces mots me volent mon avenir. Je préfère mille fois qu'on me donne rendez-vous sous les mêmes étoiles ! »
languages.original_text: {n}After a pregnant pause, Jae continues in her usual playful manner:{/n} "So... what brings you to me, shereen? Not parting words, I hope? Because I despise goodbyes. I feel as though they rob me of my future. You never want to hear 'goodbye,' after all, but only ever 'see you again under the same stars!'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Après un moment de silence lourd de sens, Jae reprend sur son ton enjoué habituel :{/n} « Alors... qu'est-ce qui vous amène, shereen ? Vous ne venez pas me faire vos adieux, j'espère ? Je déteste ça. J'ai l'impression que ces mots me volent mon avenir. Je préfère mille fois qu'on me donne rendez-vous sous les mêmes étoiles ! »

languages.text: {n}Beklenti yaratan bir duraksamanın ardından Jae, her zamanki şen şakrak edasıyla devam ediyor.{/n} "Ee... Seni yanıma getiren nedir şirinim? Veda sözcükleri değildir umarım? Çünkü vedalardan nefret ederim. Sanki geleceğimi benden çalıyorlarmış gibi hissettirirler. Nihayetinde asla 'hoşça kal' lafını duymak istemezsin, onun yerine 'aynı yıldızların altında yeniden görüşmek üzere' densin istersin!"
languages.original_text: {n}After a pregnant pause, Jae continues in her usual playful manner:{/n} "So... what brings you to me, shereen? Not parting words, I hope? Because I despise goodbyes. I feel as though they rob me of my future. You never want to hear 'goodbye,' after all, but only ever 'see you again under the same stars!'"
